metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6100 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
report/outline/index.php in Moodle 2.2.x before 2.2.7, 2.3.x before 2.3.4, and 2.4.x before 2.4.1 does not properly enforce the moodle/user:viewhiddendetails capability requirement, which allows remote authenticated users to discover a hidden lastaccess value by reading an activity report.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6100` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
